render.latex: How the variable should be rendered in LaTeX. Must use double back-strokes to properly escape them in JSON.
render.html: How the variable should be rendered in HTML

unicode.oct: How the variable should be rendered in octal
unicode.dec: How the variable should be rendered in decimal
unicode.hex: How the variable should be rendered in hexadecimal

variable_name.description: What does the variable stand for
variable_name.definition: Where in the book(s) is this defined. Provide full citation in APA?
variable_name.standard_values: If there are common values associated with this variable they should be listed as name-value pairs
